        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Unmap sprints from being synced
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Sets the Synced flag to false for all sprints in the provided list.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="body">The sprints to unmap.</param>
        /// <returns>Empty response is returned if operation was successful.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task UnmapSprintsAsync(UnmapSprintsBean body, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (body == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("body");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    var json_ = Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert.SerializeObject(body, JsonSerializerSettings);
                    var content_ = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(json_);
                    content_.Headers.ContentType = System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue.Parse("application/json");
                    request_.Content = content_;
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("PUT");

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "agile/1.0/sprint/unmap"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("agile/1.0/sprint/unmap");

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 204)
                        {
                            return;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 400)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the request is invalid.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user is not logged in.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user does not a have valid license or does not have permission to unmap sprints.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if at least one sprint does not exist or user does not have permission to view to at least one sprint.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Unmap all sprints from being synced
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Sets the Synced flag to false for all sprints on this Jira instance. This operation is intended for cleanup only. It is highly destructive and not reversible. Use with caution.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <returns>Empty response is returned if operation was successful.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task UnmapAllSprintsAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(string.Empty, System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("PUT");

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "agile/1.0/sprint/unmap-all"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("agile/1.0/sprint/unmap-all");

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 204)
                        {
                            return;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user is not logged in.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user does not a have valid license or does not have permission to unmap sprints.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if at least one sprint does not exist or user does not have permission to view to at least one sprint.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Get sprint by id
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Returns a single sprint, for a given sprint Id. The sprint will only be returned if the user can view the board that the sprint was created on, or view at least one of the issues in the sprint.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <returns>Returns the requested sprint.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<SprintBean> GetSprintAsync(long sprintId, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (sprintId == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("sprintId");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("GET");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "agile/1.0/sprint/{sprintId}"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("agile/1.0/sprint/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(sprintId, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<SprintBean>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 400)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the request is invalid.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user is not logged in.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user does not a have valid license.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the sprint does not exist.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Update a sprint fully
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Performs a full update of a sprint.
        /// <br/>A full update means that the result will be exactly the same as the request body.
        /// <br/>Any fields not present in the request JSON will be set to null.
        /// <br/>Notes:
        /// <br/>- Sprints that are in a closed state cannot be updated.
        /// <br/>- A sprint can be started by updating the state to 'active'. This requires the sprint to be in the 'future' state and have a startDate and endDate set.
        /// <br/>- A sprint can be completed by updating the state to 'closed'. This action requires the sprint to be in the 'active' state. This sets the completeDate to the time of the request.
        /// <br/>  If the sprint has offending issues (those which are complete, but have incomplete subtasks) it cannot be closed.
        /// <br/>  If issues are moved to new sprint user has to have issues edit permissions.
        /// <br/>- Other changes to state are not allowed.
        /// <br/>- The completeDate field cannot be updated manually.
        /// <br/>- Only Jira administrators can edit dates on sprints that are marked as synced.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="body">The updated sprint.</param>
        /// <returns>Returns the updated sprint.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<SprintBean> UpdateSprintAsync(long sprintId, SprintBean body, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (sprintId == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("sprintId");

            if (body == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("body");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    var json_ = Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert.SerializeObject(body, JsonSerializerSettings);
                    var content_ = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(json_);
                    content_.Headers.ContentType = System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue.Parse("application/json");
                    request_.Content = content_;
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("PUT");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "agile/1.0/sprint/{sprintId}"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("agile/1.0/sprint/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(sprintId, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<SprintBean>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 400)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the request is invalid.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user is not logged in.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user does not a have valid license.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the sprint does not exist.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Partially update a sprint
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Performs a partial update of a sprint.
        /// <br/>A partial update means that fields not present in the request JSON will not be updated.
        /// <br/>Notes:
        /// <br/>- Sprints that are in a closed state cannot be updated.
        /// <br/>- A sprint can be started by updating the state to 'active'. This requires the sprint to be in the 'future' state and have a startDate and endDate set.
        /// <br/>- A sprint can be completed by updating the state to 'closed'. This action requires the sprint to be in the 'active' state. This sets the completeDate to the time of the request.
        /// <br/>  If the sprint has offending issues (those which are complete, but have incomplete subtasks) it cannot be closed.
        /// <br/>  If issues are moved to new sprint user has to have issues edit permissions.
        /// <br/>- Other changes to state are not allowed.
        /// <br/>- The completeDate field cannot be updated manually.
        /// <br/>- Sprint goal can be removed by updating it's value to empty string
        /// <br/>- Only Jira administrators can edit dates on sprints that are marked as synced.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="body">The updated sprint.</param>
        /// <returns>Returns the updated sprint.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<SprintBean> PartiallyUpdateSprintAsync(long sprintId, SprintBean body, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (sprintId == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("sprintId");

            if (body == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("body");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    var json_ = Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert.SerializeObject(body, JsonSerializerSettings);
                    var content_ = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(json_);
                    content_.Headers.ContentType = System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue.Parse("application/json");
                    request_.Content = content_;
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("POST");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "agile/1.0/sprint/{sprintId}"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("agile/1.0/sprint/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(sprintId, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<SprintBean>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 400)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the request is invalid.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user is not logged in.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user does not a have valid license.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the sprint does not exist.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Delete a sprint
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Deletes a sprint. Once a sprint is deleted, all issues in the sprint will be moved to the backlog. To delete a synced sprint, you must unsync it first.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <returns>Returned if the sprint was deleted successfully.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task DeleteSprintAsync(long sprintId, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (sprintId == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("sprintId");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("DELETE");

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "agile/1.0/sprint/{sprintId}"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("agile/1.0/sprint/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(sprintId, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 204)
                        {
                            return;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 400)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the sprint is active or completed.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user is not logged in.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user does not a have valid license or does not have permission to delete sprints.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the sprint does not exist.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Move issues to a sprint
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Moves issues to a sprint, for a given sprint Id. Issues can only be moved to open or active sprints. The maximum number of issues that can be moved in one operation is 50.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="body">The issues to move.</param>
        /// <returns>Empty response is returned if operation was successful.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task MoveIssuesToSprintAsync(long sprintId, IssueAssignRequestBean body, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (sprintId == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("sprintId");

            if (body == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("body");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    var json_ = Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert.SerializeObject(body, JsonSerializerSettings);
                    var content_ = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(json_);
                    content_.Headers.ContentType = System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue.Parse("application/json");
                    request_.Content = content_;
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("POST");

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "agile/1.0/sprint/{sprintId}/issue"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("agile/1.0/sprint/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(sprintId, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));
                    urlBuilder_.Append("/issue");

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 204)
                        {
                            return;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 400)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the request is invalid.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user is not logged in.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user does not a have valid license or does not have permission to assign issues.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the sprint does not exist or the user does not have permission to view it.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Swap the position of two sprints
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Swap the position of the sprint with the second sprint.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="body">The sprint to swap with.</param>
        /// <returns>Returned if the sprint swap was performed successfully.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task SwapSprintAsync(long sprintId, SprintSwapBean body, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (sprintId == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("sprintId");

            if (body == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("body");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    var json_ = Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert.SerializeObject(body, JsonSerializerSettings);
                    var content_ = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(json_);
                    content_.Headers.ContentType = System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue.Parse("application/json");
                    request_.Content = content_;
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("POST");

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "agile/1.0/sprint/{sprintId}/swap"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("agile/1.0/sprint/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(sprintId, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));
                    urlBuilder_.Append("/swap");

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 204)
                        {
                            return;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user is not logged in.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user does not a have valid license or does not have permission to at least one sprint.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if at least one sprint does not exist or user does not have permission to view to at least one sprint.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Get an application property by key
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Returns an application property.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="permissionLevel">when fetching a list specifies the permission level of all items in the list
        /// <br/>see {@link com.atlassian.jira.bc.admin.ApplicationPropertiesService.EditPermissionLevel}</param>
        /// <param name="key">a String containing the property key.</param>
        /// <param name="keyFilter">when fetching a list allows the list to be filtered by the property's start of key
        /// <br/>e.g. "jira.lf.*" whould fetch only those permissions that are editable and whose keys start with
        /// <br/>     *                        "jira.lf.". This is a regex.</param>
        /// <returns>Returned if the property exists and the currently authenticated user has permission to view it. Contains a full representation of the property.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Property> GetProperty2Async(string permissionLevel, string key, string keyFilter = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (permissionLevel == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("permissionLevel");

            if (key == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("key");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("GET");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/application-properties"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/application-properties");
                    urlBuilder_.Append('?');
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("permissionLevel")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(permissionLevel, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("key")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(key, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    if (keyFilter != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("keyFilter")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(keyFilter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    urlBuilder_.Length--;

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<Property>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The action performed requires a logged in user.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the currently authenticated user does not have permission to view it.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {

                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Update an application property
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Update an application property via PUT. The "value" field present in the PUT will override the existing value.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="id">a String containing the property key.</param>
        /// <returns>Returned if the property exists and the currently authenticated user has permission to edit it.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Property> SetPropertyViaRestfulTableAsync(string id, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (id == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("id");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(string.Empty, System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("PUT");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/application-properties/{id}"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/application-properties/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(id, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<Property>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the currently authenticated user does not have permission to edit the property.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the property does not exist or the currently authenticated user does not have permission to view it.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Update application roles
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Updates the ApplicationRoles with the passed data if the version hash is the same as the server. Only the groups and default groups setting of the role may be updated. Requests to change the key or the name of the role will be silently ignored. It is acceptable to pass only the roles that are updated as roles that are present in the server but not in data to update with, will not be deleted.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="body">the data to update the roles with.</param>
        /// <returns>Returns the updated ApplicationRoles if the update was successful.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<ApplicationRoleBean> PutBulkAsync(string if_Match = null, ApplicationRoleBean body = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {

                    if (if_Match != null)
                        request_.Headers.TryAddWithoutValidation("If-Match", ConvertToString(if_Match, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture));
                    var json_ = Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert.SerializeObject(body, JsonSerializerSettings);
                    var content_ = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(json_);
                    content_.Headers.ContentType = System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue.Parse("application/json");
                    request_.Content = content_;
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("PUT");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/applicationrole"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/applicationrole");

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<ApplicationRoleBean>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the current user does not have permission to edit roles.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the current user is not an administrator.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the role does not exist.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 412)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the versionHash is not null and contains a different version to the server.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="id">id of the attachment to view</param>
        /// <returns>JSON representation of the attachment meta-data. The representation does not contain the attachment itself, but contains a URI that can be used to download the actual attached file.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Delete an attachment from an issue
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Remove an attachment from an issue.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="id">id of the attachment to remove</param>
        /// <returns>Removal was successful</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task RemoveAttachmentAsync(string id, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (id == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("id");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("DELETE");

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/attachment/{id}"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/attachment/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(id, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 204)
                        {
                            return;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The calling user is not permitted to remove the requested attachment.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Get human-readable attachment expansion
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Tries to expand an attachment. Output is human-readable and subject to change.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="id">the id of the attachment to expand.</param>
        /// <returns>JSON representation of the attachment expanded contents. Empty entry list means that attachment cannot be expanded. It's either empty, corrupt or not an archive at all.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<HumanReadableArchive> ExpandForHumansAsync(string id, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (id == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("id");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("GET");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/attachment/{id}/expand/human"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/attachment/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(id, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));
                    urlBuilder_.Append("/expand/human");

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<HumanReadableArchive>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The calling user is not permitted to view the requested attachment.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Any of: there is no attachment with the requested id, attachments feature is disabled", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 409)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The archive format is not supported. since v6.4", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Get raw attachment expansion
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Tries to expand an attachment. Output is raw and should be backwards-compatible through the course of time.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="id">the id of the attachment to expand.</param>
        /// <returns>JSON representation of the attachment expanded contents. Empty entry list means that attachment cannot be expanded. It's either empty, corrupt or not an archive at all.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
