        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Get all system avatars
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Returns all system avatars of the given type.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="type">the avatar type</param>
        /// <returns>Returns a map containing a list of system avatars. A map is returned to be consistent with the shape of the project/KEY/avatars REST end point.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<AvatarBean> GetAllSystemAvatarsAsync(string type, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (type == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("type");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("GET");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/avatar/{type}/system"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/avatar/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(type, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));
                    urlBuilder_.Append("/system");

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<AvatarBean>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if accessed by anonymous user", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }

                        if (status_ == 500)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if an error occurs while retrieving the list of avatars.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else

                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Create temporary avatar
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Creates temporary avatar
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="type">the avatar type</param>
        /// <param name="filename">name of file being uploaded</param>
        /// <param name="size">size of file</param>
        /// <returns>temporary avatar cropping instructions</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<AvatarCroppingBean> StoreTemporaryAvatarAsync(string type, string filename = null, string size = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (type == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("type");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(string.Empty, System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("POST");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/avatar/{type}/temporary"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/avatar/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(type, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));
                    urlBuilder_.Append("/temporary");
                    urlBuilder_.Append('?');
                    if (filename != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("filename")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(filename, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (size != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("size")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(size, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    urlBuilder_.Length--;

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 201)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<AvatarCroppingBean>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 400)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Validation failed. For example filesize is beyond max attachment size.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the request does not contain a valid XSRF token", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 500)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if an error occurs while converting temporary avatar to real avatar", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Update avatar cropping
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Updates the cropping instructions of the temporary avatar
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="type">the avatar type</param>
        /// <param name="body">cropping instructions</param>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task CreateAvatarFromTemporaryAsync(string type, AvatarCroppingBean body = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (type == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("type");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    var json_ = Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert.SerializeObject(body, JsonSerializerSettings);
                    var content_ = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(json_);
                    content_.Headers.ContentType = System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue.Parse("application/json");
                    request_.Content = content_;
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("POST");

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/avatar/{type}/temporaryCrop"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/avatar/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(type, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));
                    urlBuilder_.Append("/temporaryCrop");

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 400)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the cropping coordinates are invalid", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 500)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if an error occurs while cropping the temporary avatar", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else

                        if (status_ == 200 || status_ == 204)
                        {

                            return;
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Request node index snapshot
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Request current index from node (the request is processed asynchronously). This method is deprecated as it is Lucene specific and is planned for removal in Jira 11.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="nodeId">ID of the node to request index from</param>
        /// <returns>Request was successful</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        [System.Obsolete]
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task RequestCurrentIndexFromNodeAsync(string nodeId, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (nodeId == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("nodeId");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(string.Empty, System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("PUT");

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/cluster/index-snapshot/{nodeId}"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/cluster/index-snapshot/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(nodeId, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            return;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user doesn\'t have admin permissions", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the node with this nodeID doesn\'t exist", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 405)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if you call this method, but don\'t have Jira Data Center", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Delete a cluster node
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Delete the node from the cluster if state of node is OFFLINE.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="nodeId">ID of the node to delete</param>
        /// <returns>Removal was successful</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task DeleteNodeAsync(string nodeId, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (nodeId == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("nodeId");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("DELETE");

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/cluster/node/{nodeId}"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/cluster/node/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(nodeId, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 204)
                        {
                            return;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user doesn\'t have admin permissions", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the node with this nodeID doesn\'t exist", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 405)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if you call this method, but don\'t have Jira Data Center", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 500)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the server can\'t delete the node", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Update node state to offline
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Change the node's state to offline if the node is reporting as active, but is not alive.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="nodeId">ID of the node to change state</param>
        /// <returns>State change was successful</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task ChangeNodeStateToOfflineAsync(string nodeId, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (nodeId == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("nodeId");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(string.Empty, System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("PUT");

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/cluster/node/{nodeId}/offline"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/cluster/node/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(nodeId, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));
                    urlBuilder_.Append("/offline");

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            return;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user doesn\'t have admin permissions", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the node with this nodeID doesn\'t exist", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 405)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if you call this method, but don\'t have Jira Data Center", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 500)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the server can\'t change the node\'s state", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {

                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)

                    client_.Dispose();

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Approve cluster upgrade
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Approves the cluster upgrade.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <returns>Upgrade approval was successful</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task ApproveUpgradeAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(string.Empty, System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("POST");

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/cluster/zdu/approve"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/cluster/zdu/approve");

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            return;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user doesn\'t have admin permissions", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 409)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if there is no ongoing upgrade to approve", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Cancel cluster upgrade
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Cancels the ongoing cluster upgrade.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <returns>Upgrade cancellation was successful</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task CancelUpgradeAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(string.Empty, System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("POST");

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/cluster/zdu/cancel"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/cluster/zdu/cancel");

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 201)
                        {
                            return;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user doesn\'t have admin permissions", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 409)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if there is no ongoing upgrade to cancel", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Retry cluster upgrade
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Retries the cluster upgrade.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <returns>Upgrade retry was successful</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task AcknowledgeErrorsAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(string.Empty, System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");

                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/cluster/zdu/retryUpgrade");

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            return;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)

                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);

            finally

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Create component
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Create a component via POST.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="body">the request containing value of the component's property. The value has to be a valid, non-empty JSON conforming to http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4627. The maximum length of the property value is 32768 bytes.</param>
        /// <returns>Returned if the component is created successfully.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<ComponentBean> CreateComponentAsync(ComponentBean body = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    var json_ = Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert.SerializeObject(body, JsonSerializerSettings);
                    var content_ = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(json_);
                    content_.Headers.ContentType = System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue.Parse("application/json");
                    request_.Content = content_;
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("POST");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/component"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/component");

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 201)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<ComponentBean>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the caller is not logged in and does not have permission to create components in the project.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the caller is authenticated and does not have permission to create components in the project.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the project does not exist or the currently authenticated user does not have permission to view it.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Get paginated components
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Returns paginated list of filtered active components
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="maxResults">the maximum number of components to return</param>
        /// <param name="query">the string that components names will be matched with</param>
        /// <param name="projectIds">the set of project ids to filter components</param>
        /// <param name="startAt">the index of the first components to return</param>
        /// <returns>Returns paginated list of components</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<PageBean> GetPaginatedComponentsAsync(string maxResults = null, string query = null, string projectIds = null, string startAt = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("GET");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/component/page"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/component/page");
                    urlBuilder_.Append('?');
                    if (maxResults != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("maxResults")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(maxResults, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (query != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("query")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(query, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (projectIds != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("projectIds")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(projectIds, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (startAt != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("startAt")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(startAt, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    urlBuilder_.Length--;

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<PageBean>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Get project component
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Returns a project component.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="id">a String containing the component key</param>
        /// <returns>Returns a full JSON representation of a project component.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<ComponentBean> GetComponentAsync(string id, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (id == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("id");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("GET");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/component/{id}"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/component/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(id, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<ComponentBean>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if there is no component with the given key, or if the calling user does not have permission to view the component.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Update a component
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Modify a component via PUT. Any fields present in the PUT will override existing values. As a convenience, if a field is not present, it is silently ignored.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="id">The component to delete.</param>
        /// <param name="body">the request containing value of the component's property. The value has to be a valid, non-empty JSON conforming to http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4627. The maximum length of the property value is 32768 bytes.</param>
        /// <returns>Returned if the component is successfully updated.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<ComponentBean> UpdateComponentAsync(string id, ComponentBean body = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (id == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("id");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    var json_ = Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert.SerializeObject(body, JsonSerializerSettings);
                    var content_ = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(json_);
                    content_.Headers.ContentType = System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue.Parse("application/json");
                    request_.Content = content_;
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("PUT");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/component/{id}"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/component/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(id, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<ComponentBean>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the currently authenticated user does not have permission to edit the component.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the component does not exist or the currently authenticated user does not have permission to view it.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Delete a project component
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Delete a project component.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="id">The component to delete.</param>
        /// <param name="moveIssuesTo">The new component applied to issues whose 'id' component will be deleted. If this value is null, then the 'id' component is simply removed from the related isues.</param>
        /// <returns>Returned if the component is successfully deleted.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task DeleteAsync(string id, string moveIssuesTo = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (id == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("id");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("DELETE");

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/component/{id}"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/component/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(id, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));
                    urlBuilder_.Append('?');
                    if (moveIssuesTo != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("moveIssuesTo")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(moveIssuesTo, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    urlBuilder_.Length--;

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            return;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 204)
                        {
                            return;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the currently authenticated user does not have permission to delete the component.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the component does not exist or the currently authenticated user does not have permission to view it.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Get custom fields with pagination
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Returns a list of Custom Fields in the given range.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="sortColumn">The column by which to sort the returned custom fields.</param>
        /// <param name="types">A list of custom field types to filter the custom fields.</param>
        /// <param name="search">A query string used to search custom fields.</param>
        /// <param name="maxResults">The maximum number of custom fields to return.</param>
        /// <param name="sortOrder">The order in which to sort the returned custom fields.</param>
        /// <param name="screenIds">A list of screen IDs to filter the custom fields.</param>
        /// <param name="lastValueUpdate">The last value update to filter the custom fields.</param>
        /// <param name="projectIds">A list of project IDs to filter the custom fields.</param>
        /// <param name="startAt">The starting index of the returned custom fields.</param>
        /// <returns>Returned if a custom field with the given customFieldId exists and user has permission to it.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<CustomFieldBean> GetCustomFieldsAsync(string sortColumn = null, string types = null, string search = null, string maxResults = null, string sortOrder = null, string screenIds = null, string lastValueUpdate = null, string projectIds = null, string startAt = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("GET");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/customFields"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/customFields");
                    urlBuilder_.Append('?');
                    if (sortColumn != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("sortColumn")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(sortColumn, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (types != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("types")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(types, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (search != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("search")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(search, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (maxResults != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("maxResults")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(maxResults, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (sortOrder != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("sortOrder")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(sortOrder, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (screenIds != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("screenIds")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(screenIds, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (lastValueUpdate != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("lastValueUpdate")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(lastValueUpdate, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (projectIds != null)

                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("projectIds")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(projectIds, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (startAt != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("startAt")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(startAt, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    urlBuilder_.Length--;

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
