        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Delete a specified group
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Deletes a group by given group parameter
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="groupname">The name of the group to delete.</param>
        /// <param name="swapGroup">A different group to transfer the restrictions to.</param>
        /// <returns>Returned if the group was deleted.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task RemoveGroupAsync(string groupname, string swapGroup = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (groupname == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("groupname");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("DELETE");

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/group"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/group");
                    urlBuilder_.Append('?');
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("groupname")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(groupname, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    if (swapGroup != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("swapGroup")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(swapGroup, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    urlBuilder_.Length--;

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            return;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 400)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if user requested a group that does not exist", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the current user is not authenticated.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the current user does not have administrator permissions.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the requested group was not found.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();

            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Get users from a specified group
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Returns a paginated list of users who are members of the specified group and its subgroups
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="groupname">The group name.</param>
        /// <param name="includeInactiveUsers">Include inactive users.</param>
        /// <param name="maxResults">The maximum number of users to return.</param>
        /// <param name="startAt">The index of the first user in group to return.</param>
        /// <returns>Returns a paginated list of users in the group</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<UserJsonBean> GetUsersFromGroupAsync(string groupname, string includeInactiveUsers = null, string maxResults = null, string startAt = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (groupname == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("groupname");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("GET");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/group/member"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/group/member");
                    urlBuilder_.Append('?');
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("groupname")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(groupname, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    if (includeInactiveUsers != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("includeInactiveUsers")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(includeInactiveUsers, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (maxResults != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("maxResults")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(maxResults, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (startAt != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("startAt")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(startAt, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    urlBuilder_.Length--;

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<UserJsonBean>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 400)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the name of the provided group is empty", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user is not logged in.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the calling user is not admin or sysadmin", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the specified group does not exist", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Add a user to a specified group
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>

        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="groupname">A name of requested group.</param>
        /// <returns>Returns full representation of a Jira group in JSON format.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<GroupBean> AddUserToGroupAsync(string groupname, UpdateUserToGroupBean body = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                        }

                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Remove a user from a specified group
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Removes given user from a group
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="groupname">A name of requested group.</param>
        /// <param name="username">User to remove from a group</param>
        /// <returns>If the user was removed from the group.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task RemoveUserFromGroupAsync(string groupname, string username, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (groupname == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("groupname");

            if (username == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("username");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("DELETE");

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/group/user"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/group/user");
                    urlBuilder_.Append('?');
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("groupname")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(groupname, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("username")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(username, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    urlBuilder_.Length--;

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            return;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 400)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if user requested an empty group name", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the current user is not authenticated.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }

                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the current user does not have administrator permissions.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the requested group was not found or the requested user wan not found", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {

                            response_.Dispose();

            finally

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Get groups matching a query
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Returns groups with substrings matching a given query
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="maxResults">Maximum number of results to return</param>
        /// <param name="query">A String to match groups against</param>
        /// <param name="exclude">List of groups to exclude</param>
        /// <param name="userName">Username for the context</param>
        /// <returns>Returns a collection of matching groups</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<GroupSuggestionsBean> FindGroupsAsync(string maxResults = null, string query = null, string exclude = null, string userName = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("GET");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/groups/picker"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/groups/picker");
                    urlBuilder_.Append('?');
                    if (maxResults != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("maxResults")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(maxResults, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (query != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("query")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(query, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (exclude != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("exclude")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(exclude, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (userName != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("userName")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(userName, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    urlBuilder_.Length--;

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<GroupSuggestionsBean>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// </remarks>

        /// <param name="maxResults">The maximum number of users to return</param>

        /// <param name="showAvatar">Show avatar</param>

            var disposeClient_ = false;

                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {

                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Create index snapshot if not in progress
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Starts taking an index snapshot if no other snapshot creation process is in progress
        /// </remarks>
        /// <returns>Returns the absolute path which index snapshot will be placed in, after it's created</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<IndexSnapshotPromiseBean> CreateIndexSnapshotAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(string.Empty, System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("POST");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/index-snapshot"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/index-snapshot");

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 202)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<IndexSnapshotPromiseBean>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the caller doesn\'t have sufficient privileges", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 409)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if snapshot creation is already in progress", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Get index condition summary
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Returns a summary of the index condition of the current node.
        /// <br/>The returned data consists of:
        /// <br/>- `nodeId` - Node identifier.
        /// <br/>- `reportTime` - Time of this report creation.
        /// <br/>- `issueIndex` - Summary of the issue index status.
        /// <br/>- `replicationQueues` - Map of index replication queues, where keys represent nodes from which replication operations came from.
        /// <br/>
        /// <br/>`issueIndex` can contain:
        /// <br/>    - `indexReadable` - If `false` the endpoint failed to read data from the issue index (check Jira logs for detailed stack trace), otherwise `true`.
        /// <br/>    - `countInDatabase` - Count of issues found in the database.
        /// <br/>    - `countInIndex` - Count of issues found while querying the index.
        /// <br/>    - `lastUpdatedInDatabase` - Time of the last update of the issue found in the database.
        /// <br/>    - `lastUpdatedInIndex` - Time of the last update of the issue found while querying the index.
        /// <br/>`replicationQueues`'s map values can contain:
        /// <br/>    - `lastConsumedOperation` - Last executed index replication operation by the current node from the sending node's queue.
        /// <br/>    - `lastConsumedOperation.id` - Identifier of the operation.
        /// <br/>    - `lastConsumedOperation.replicationTime` - Time when the operation was sent to other nodes.
        /// <br/>    - `lastOperationInQueue` - Last index replication operation in the sending node's queue.
        /// <br/>    - `lastOperationInQueue.id` - Identifier of the operation.
        /// <br/>    - `lastOperationInQueue.replicationTime` - Time when the operation was sent to other nodes.
        /// <br/>    - `queueSize` - Number of operations in the queue from the sending node to the current node.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <returns>Returns an object with data about the condition of the Jira node's index</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<IndexSummaryBean> GetIndexSummaryAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("GET");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/index/summary"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/index/summary");

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<IndexSummaryBean>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned when the current authenticated user does not have admin permission", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Create an issue or sub-task from json
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Creates an issue or a sub-task from a JSON representation.
        /// <br/>The fields that can be set on create, in either the fields parameter or the update parameter can be determined using the /rest/api/2/issue/createmeta resource.
        /// <br/>If a field is not configured to appear on the create screen, then it will not be in the createmeta, and a field
        /// <br/>validation error will occur if it is submitted.
        /// <br/>Creating a sub-task is similar to creating a regular issue, with two important differences:
        /// <br/>- the issueType field must correspond to a sub-task issue type (you can use /issue/createmeta to discover sub-task issue types), and
        /// <br/>- you must provide a parent field in the issue create request containing the id or key of the parent issue.
        /// <br/>The updateHistory param adds the project that this issue is created in, to the current user's project history, if set to true (by default, the project history is not updated).
        /// <br/>You can view the project history in the Jira application, via the Projects dropdown.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="body">Issue update bean</param>
        /// <returns>Returns a link to the created issue.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<IssueCreateResponse> CreateIssueAsync(bool? updateHistory = null, IssueUpdateBean body = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    var json_ = Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert.SerializeObject(body, JsonSerializerSettings);
                    var content_ = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(json_);
                    content_.Headers.ContentType = System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue.Parse("application/json");
                    request_.Content = content_;
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("POST");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/issue"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/issue");
                    urlBuilder_.Append('?');
                    if (updateHistory != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("updateHistory")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(updateHistory, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    urlBuilder_.Length--;

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 201)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<IssueCreateResponse>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 400)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the input is invalid (e.g. missing required fields, invalid field values, and so forth).", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Archive list of issues
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Archives a list of issues.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="notifyUsers">Send the email with notification that the issue was updated to users that watch it. Admin or project admin permissions are required to disable the notification.</param>
        /// <param name="body">List of issue keys</param>
        /// <returns>Returns a stream of issues archiving results.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<object> ArchiveIssuesAsync(string notifyUsers = null, string body = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    var content_ = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(body);
                    content_.Headers.ContentType = System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue.Parse("text/plain");
                    request_.Content = content_;
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("POST");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("text/plain"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/issue/archive"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/issue/archive");
                    urlBuilder_.Append('?');
                    if (notifyUsers != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("notifyUsers")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(notifyUsers, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    urlBuilder_.Length--;

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            var result_ = (object)System.Convert.ChangeType(responseData_, typeof(object));
                            return result_;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user is not logged in.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the currently authenticated user does not have permission to archive the issue or doesn\'t have DC license or issue is already archived.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the issue does not exist.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Create an issue or sub-task from json - bulk operation.
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Creates issues or sub-tasks from a JSON representation. Creates many issues in one bulk operation.
        /// <br/>Creating a sub-task is similar to creating a regular issue. More details can be found in createIssue section.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="body">Issues update bean</param>
        /// <returns>Returns a link to the created issues.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<IssuesCreateResponse> CreateIssuesAsync(IssuesUpdateBean body = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    var json_ = Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert.SerializeObject(body, JsonSerializerSettings);
                    var content_ = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(json_);
                    content_.Headers.ContentType = System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue.Parse("application/json");
                    request_.Content = content_;
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("POST");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/issue/bulk"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/issue/bulk");

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 201)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<IssuesCreateResponse>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 400)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the input is invalid (e.g. missing required fields, invalid field values, and so forth).", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// </summary>

        /// Returns the metadata for issue types used for creating issues. Data will not be returned if the user does not have permission to create issues in that project.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="issueTypeId">Issue type id</param>
        /// <param name="projectIdOrKey">Project id or key</param>
        /// <param name="maxResults">How many results on the page should be included</param>
        /// <param name="startAt">The page offset</param>
        /// <returns>Returns the metadata for issue types used for creating issues.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<FieldMetaBean> GetCreateIssueMetaFieldsAsync(string issueTypeId, string projectIdOrKey, string maxResults = null, string startAt = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))

                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("issueTypeId");

                    }
