        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Get remote issue links for an issue
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Get remote issue links for an issue.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="issueIdOrKey">Issue id or key</param>
        /// <param name="globalId">Global id of the remote issue link</param>
        /// <returns>Returns a response containing remote issue links for the issue.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<RemoteIssueLinkBean> GetRemoteIssueLinksAsync(string issueIdOrKey, string globalId = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (issueIdOrKey == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("issueIdOrKey");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("GET");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/issue/{issueIdOrKey}/remotelink"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/issue/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(issueIdOrKey, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));
                    urlBuilder_.Append("/remotelink");
                    urlBuilder_.Append('?');
                    if (globalId != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("globalId")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(globalId, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    urlBuilder_.Length--;

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<RemoteIssueLinkBean>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 400)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the linkId is not a valid number, or if the remote issue link with the given id does not belong to the given issue.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the calling user is not authenticated.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the calling user does not have permission to view the remote issue link, or if issue linking is disabled.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the issue or remote issue link do not exist.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Create or update remote issue link
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Creates or updates a remote issue link from a JSON representation. If a globalId is provided and a remote issue link exists with that globalId, the remote issue link is updated. Otherwise, the remote issue link is created.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="issueIdOrKey">Issue id or key</param>
        /// <param name="body">Remote issue link create or update request</param>
        /// <returns>Returns a link to the created/updated remote issue link.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<RemoteIssueLinkBean> CreateOrUpdateRemoteIssueLinkAsync(string issueIdOrKey, RemoteIssueLinkCreateOrUpdateRequest body = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {

                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("issueIdOrKey");

                {

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/issue/{issueIdOrKey}/remotelink"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/issue/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(issueIdOrKey, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));
                    urlBuilder_.Append("/remotelink");

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)

                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else

                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the input is invalid (e.g. missing required fields, invalid values, and so forth).", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the calling user is not authenticated.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the calling user does not have permission to create/update the remote issue link, or if issue linking is disabled.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Delete remote issue link
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Delete the remote issue link with the given global id on the issue.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="issueIdOrKey">Issue id or key</param>
        /// <param name="globalId">Global id of the remote issue link</param>
        /// <returns>Returned if the remote issue link was removed successfully.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task DeleteRemoteIssueLinkByGlobalIdAsync(string issueIdOrKey, string globalId, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {

                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("issueIdOrKey");

                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("globalId");

                    urlBuilder_.Append("/remotelink");

                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("globalId")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(globalId, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    urlBuilder_.Length--;

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);

                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Get a remote issue link by its id
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Get a remote issue link by its id.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="linkId">Id of the remote issue link</param>
        /// <param name="issueIdOrKey">Issue id or key</param>
        /// <returns>Returns a response containing a remote issue link.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<RemoteIssueLinkBean> GetRemoteIssueLinkByIdAsync(string linkId, string issueIdOrKey, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (linkId == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("linkId");

            if (issueIdOrKey == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("issueIdOrKey");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("GET");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/issue/{issueIdOrKey}/remotelink/{linkId}"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/issue/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(issueIdOrKey, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));
                    urlBuilder_.Append("/remotelink/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(linkId, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<RemoteIssueLinkBean>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 400)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the linkId is not a valid number, or if the remote issue link with the given id does not belong to the given issue.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the calling user is not authenticated.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the calling user does not have permission to view the remote issue link, or if issue linking is disabled.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the issue or remote issue link do not exist.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Update remote issue link
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Updates a remote issue link from a JSON representation. Any fields not provided are set to null.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="linkId">Id of the remote issue link</param>
        /// <param name="issueIdOrKey">Issue id or key</param>
        /// <param name="body">Remote issue link create or update request</param>
        /// <returns>Returns a response indicating the result of the update operation.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task UpdateRemoteIssueLinkAsync(string linkId, string issueIdOrKey, RemoteIssueLinkCreateOrUpdateRequest body = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (linkId == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("linkId");

            if (issueIdOrKey == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("issueIdOrKey");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    var json_ = Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert.SerializeObject(body, JsonSerializerSettings);
                    var content_ = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(json_);
                    content_.Headers.ContentType = System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue.Parse("application/json");
                    request_.Content = content_;
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("PUT");

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/issue/{issueIdOrKey}/remotelink/{linkId}"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/issue/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(issueIdOrKey, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));
                    urlBuilder_.Append("/remotelink/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(linkId, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 204)
                        {
                            return;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 400)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the input is invalid (e.g. missing required fields, invalid values, and so forth).", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the calling user is not authenticated.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the calling user does not have permission to update the remote issue link, or if issue linking is disabled.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Restore an archived issue
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Restores an archived issue.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="issueIdOrKey">Issue id or key</param>
        /// <param name="notifyUsers">Send the email with notification that the issue was updated to users that watch it. Admin or project admin permissions are required to disable the notification.</param>
        /// <returns>Returns a response indicating the result of the restore operation.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task RestoreIssueAsync(string issueIdOrKey, string notifyUsers = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (issueIdOrKey == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("issueIdOrKey");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(string.Empty, System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("PUT");

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/issue/{issueIdOrKey}/restore"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/issue/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(issueIdOrKey, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));
                    urlBuilder_.Append("/restore");
                    urlBuilder_.Append('?');
                    if (notifyUsers != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("notifyUsers")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(notifyUsers, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    urlBuilder_.Length--;

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 204)
                        {
                            return;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user is not logged in.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the currently authenticated user does not have permission to restore the issue or doesn\'t have DC license or issue is not archived.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the issue does not exist.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Get an issue's subtask list
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Returns an issue's subtask list
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="issueIdOrKey">The parent issue's key or id</param>
        /// <returns>Returned if the request was successful.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<IssueRefJsonBean> GetSubTasksAsync(string issueIdOrKey, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (issueIdOrKey == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("issueIdOrKey");

            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("GET");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/issue/");

                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try

                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;

                        {

                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)

                        }

                        {

                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user is not allowed to edit the issue", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else

                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the issue doesn\'t exist", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);

                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }

                    finally

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Reorder an issue's subtasks
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Reorders an issue's subtasks by moving the subtask at index 'from' to index 'to'.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="issueIdOrKey">The parent issue's key or id</param>
        /// <param name="body">The description of previous and current position of subtask in the sequence.</param>
        /// <returns>Returned if the request was successful</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task MoveSubTasksAsync(string issueIdOrKey, IssueSubTaskMovePositionBean body, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (issueIdOrKey == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("issueIdOrKey");

            if (body == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("body");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    var json_ = Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert.SerializeObject(body, JsonSerializerSettings);
                    var content_ = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(json_);
                    content_.Headers.ContentType = System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue.Parse("application/json");
                    request_.Content = content_;
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("POST");

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/issue/{issueIdOrKey}/subtask/move"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/issue/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(issueIdOrKey, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));
                    urlBuilder_.Append("/subtask/move");

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 204)
                        {
                            return;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 400)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the from or to parameters are out of bounds", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user is not allowed to edit the issue", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the parent issue doesn\'t exist", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Get list of transitions possible for an issue
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Get a list of the transitions possible for this issue by the current user, along with fields that are required and their types.
        /// <br/>Fields will only be returned if `expand=transitions.fields`.
        /// <br/>The fields in the metadata correspond to the fields in the transition screen for that transition.
        /// <br/>Fields not in the screen will not be in the metadata.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="issueIdOrKey">Issue id or key</param>
        /// <param name="transitionId">Transition id</param>
        /// <returns>Returns a response containing a Map of TransitionFieldBeans for each transition possible by the current user.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<TransitionsMetaBean> GetTransitionsAsync(string issueIdOrKey, string transitionId = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (issueIdOrKey == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("issueIdOrKey");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("GET");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/issue/{issueIdOrKey}/transitions"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/issue/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(issueIdOrKey, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));
                    urlBuilder_.Append("/transitions");
                    urlBuilder_.Append('?');
                    if (transitionId != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("transitionId")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(transitionId, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    urlBuilder_.Length--;

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<TransitionsMetaBean>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the issue does not exist or the user does not have permission to view it.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Perform a transition on an issue
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Perform a transition on an issue.
        /// <br/>When performing the transition you can update or set other issue fields.
        /// <br/>The fields that can be set on transition, in either the fields parameter or the update parameter can be determined using the /rest/api/2/issue/{issueIdOrKey}/transitions?expand=transitions.fields resource.
        /// <br/>If a field is not configured to appear on the transition screen, then it will not be in the transition metadata, and a field validation error will occur if it is submitted.
        /// <br/>The updateHistory param adds the issues retrieved by this method to the current user's issue history, if set to true (by default, the issue history does not include issues retrieved via the REST API).
        /// <br/>You can view the issue history in the Jira application, via the Issues dropdown or by using the lastViewed JQL field in an issue search.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="issueIdOrKey">Issue id or key</param>
        /// <param name="body">Issue update bean</param>
        /// <returns>Returns a response indicating the result of the transition operation.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task DoTransitionAsync(string issueIdOrKey, IssueUpdateBean body = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (issueIdOrKey == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("issueIdOrKey");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    var json_ = Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert.SerializeObject(body, JsonSerializerSettings);
                    var content_ = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(json_);
                    content_.Headers.ContentType = System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue.Parse("application/json");
                    request_.Content = content_;
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("POST");

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/issue/{issueIdOrKey}/transitions"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/issue/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(issueIdOrKey, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));
                    urlBuilder_.Append("/transitions");

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 204)
                        {
                            return;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 400)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the transition is not valid for the issue, or the user does not have permission to transition the issue.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the issue does not exist.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 500)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("If transition ID is incorrect.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Add vote to issue
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Adds voter (currently logged user) to particular ticket. You need to be logged in to use this method.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="issueIdOrKey">Issue id.</param>
        /// <returns>Returns the vote count for particular ticket.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task AddVoteAsync(string issueIdOrKey, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (issueIdOrKey == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("issueIdOrKey");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(string.Empty, System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("POST");

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();

                    // Operation Path: "api/2/issue/{issueIdOrKey}/votes"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/issue/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(issueIdOrKey, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));
                    urlBuilder_.Append("/votes");

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {

        /// <summary>

        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="issueIdOrKey">Issue id or key</param>
        /// <returns>Returns a response indicating the result of the remove vote operation.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Get worklogs for an issue
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Returns all work logs for an issue. Work logs won't be returned if the Log work field is hidden for the project.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="issueIdOrKey">Issue id or key</param>
        /// <returns>Returns a collection of worklogs associated with the issue, with count and pagination information.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<WorklogWithPaginationBean> GetIssueWorklogAsync(string issueIdOrKey, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (issueIdOrKey == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("issueIdOrKey");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("GET");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/issue/{issueIdOrKey}/worklog"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/issue/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(issueIdOrKey, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));
                    urlBuilder_.Append("/worklog");

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<WorklogWithPaginationBean>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the issue with the given id/key does not exist or if the currently authenticated user does not have permission to view it.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Add a worklog entry
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Adds a new worklog entry to an issue.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="issueIdOrKey">a string containing the issue id or key the worklog will be added to</param>
        /// <param name="newEstimate">Required when 'new' is selected for adjustEstimate. e.g. "2d"</param>
        /// <param name="adjustEstimate">Allows you to provide specific instructions to update the remaining time estimate of the issue. Valid values are: new, leave, manual, auto</param>
        /// <param name="reduceBy">Required when 'manual' is selected for adjustEstimate. e.g. "2d"</param>
        /// <param name="body">Worklog create request</param>
        /// <returns>Returned if add was successful.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Worklog> AddWorklogAsync(string issueIdOrKey, string newEstimate = null, string adjustEstimate = null, string reduceBy = null, Worklog body = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (issueIdOrKey == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("issueIdOrKey");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    var json_ = Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert.SerializeObject(body, JsonSerializerSettings);
                    var content_ = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(json_);
                    content_.Headers.ContentType = System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue.Parse("application/json");
                    request_.Content = content_;
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("POST");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/issue/{issueIdOrKey}/worklog"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/issue/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(issueIdOrKey, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));
                    urlBuilder_.Append("/worklog");
                    urlBuilder_.Append('?');
                    if (newEstimate != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("newEstimate")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(newEstimate, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (adjustEstimate != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("adjustEstimate")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(adjustEstimate, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (reduceBy != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("reduceBy")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(reduceBy, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    urlBuilder_.Length--;

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 201)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<Worklog>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 400)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the input is invalid (e.g. missing required fields, invalid values, and so forth).", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the calling user does not have permission to add the worklog.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Get a worklog by id
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Returns a specific worklog. The work log won't be returned if the Log work field is hidden for the project.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="issueIdOrKey">Issue id or key</param>
        /// <param name="id">Worklog id</param>
        /// <returns>Returns a response containing a worklog.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Worklog> GetWorklogAsync(string issueIdOrKey, string id, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (issueIdOrKey == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("issueIdOrKey");

            if (id == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("id");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("GET");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/issue/{issueIdOrKey}/worklog/{id}"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/issue/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(issueIdOrKey, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));
                    urlBuilder_.Append("/worklog/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(id, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<Worklog>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the work log with the given id does not exist or if the currently authenticated user does not have permission to view it.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Update a worklog entry
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Updates an existing worklog entry. Note that:
        /// <br/>- Fields possible for editing are: comment, visibility, started, timeSpent and timeSpentSeconds.
        /// <br/>- Either timeSpent or timeSpentSeconds can be set.
        /// <br/>- Fields which are not set will not be updated.
        /// <br/>- For a request to be valid, it has to have at least one field change.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="issueIdOrKey">a string containing the issue id or key the worklog belongs to</param>
        /// <param name="id">id of the worklog to be updated</param>
        /// <param name="newEstimate">required when 'new' is selected for adjustEstimate</param>
        /// <param name="adjustEstimate">allows you to provide specific instructions to update the remaining time estimate of the issue. Valid values are: new, leave, auto</param>
        /// <param name="body">Worklog update request</param>
        /// <returns>Returned if update was successful.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Worklog> UpdateWorklogAsync(string issueIdOrKey, string id, string newEstimate = null, string adjustEstimate = null, Worklog body = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (issueIdOrKey == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("issueIdOrKey");

            if (id == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("id");

            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {

                {

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();

                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/issue/");

                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("newEstimate")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(newEstimate, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (adjustEstimate != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("adjustEstimate")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(adjustEstimate, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');

                    var disposeResponse_ = true;

                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;

                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;

                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the calling user does not have permission to update the worklog.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);

                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Delete a worklog entry
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Deletes an existing worklog entry.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="issueIdOrKey">a string containing the issue id or key the worklog belongs to</param>
        /// <param name="id">Id of the worklog to be deleted</param>
        /// <param name="newEstimate">Required when 'new' is selected for adjustEstimate. e.g. "2d"</param>
        /// <param name="adjustEstimate">Allows you to provide specific instructions to update the remaining time estimate of the issue. Valid values are: new, leave, manual, auto</param>
        /// <param name="increaseBy">Required when 'manual' is selected for adjustEstimate. e.g. "2d"</param>
        /// <returns>Returned if delete was successful.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task DeleteWorklogAsync(string issueIdOrKey, string id, string newEstimate = null, string adjustEstimate = null, string increaseBy = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (issueIdOrKey == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("issueIdOrKey");

            if (id == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("id");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {

                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/issue/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(issueIdOrKey, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));
                    urlBuilder_.Append("/worklog/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(id, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));
                    urlBuilder_.Append('?');
