        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Delete actors from project role
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Deletes actors (users or groups) from a project role.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <returns>No content on success</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task DeleteActorAsync(string projectIdOrKey, long id, string user = null, string group = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (projectIdOrKey == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("projectIdOrKey");

            if (id == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("id");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("DELETE");

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/project/{projectIdOrKey}/role/{id}"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/project/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(projectIdOrKey, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));
                    urlBuilder_.Append("/role/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(id, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));
                    urlBuilder_.Append('?');
                    if (user != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("user")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(user, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (group != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("group")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(group, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    urlBuilder_.Length--;

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 204)
                        {
                            return;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the project or role is not found, the calling user does not have permission to view it or does not have permission to modify the actors in the project role.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 410)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if none of the specified groups and users exist.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Update project type
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Updates the type of a project
        /// </remarks>
        /// <returns>Updated project data</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<ProjectBean> UpdateProjectTypeAsync(string projectIdOrKey, string newProjectTypeKey, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (projectIdOrKey == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("projectIdOrKey");

            if (newProjectTypeKey == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("newProjectTypeKey");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(string.Empty, System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("PUT");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/project/{projectIdOrKey}/type/{newProjectTypeKey}"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/project/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(projectIdOrKey, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));
                    urlBuilder_.Append("/type/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(newProjectTypeKey, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<ProjectBean>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 400)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the request is not valid and the project type could not be updated", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user is not authenticated", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user does not have rights to update projects", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the project does not exist", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {

                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();

        /// <summary>
        /// Get paginated project versions
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Returns all versions for the specified project. Results are paginated. Results can be ordered by the following fields: sequence, name, startDate, releaseDate.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <returns>Project versions</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<PageBean> GetProjectVersionsPaginatedAsync(string projectIdOrKey, string expand = null, int? maxResults = null, string orderBy = null, long? startAt = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (projectIdOrKey == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("projectIdOrKey");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {

                {

                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    // Operation Path: "api/2/project/{projectIdOrKey}/version"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/project/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(projectIdOrKey, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));
                    urlBuilder_.Append("/version");
                    urlBuilder_.Append('?');
                    if (expand != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("expand")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(expand, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (maxResults != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("maxResults")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(maxResults, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (orderBy != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("orderBy")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(orderBy, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (startAt != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("startAt")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(startAt, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    urlBuilder_.Length--;

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try

                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)

                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)

                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;

                            {

                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)

                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the project is not found, or the calling user does not have permission to view it", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Assign permission scheme to project
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Assigns a permission scheme with a project
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="body">Object that contains an id of the scheme</param>
        /// <returns>Shortened details of the newly associated permission scheme.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<PermissionSchemeBean> AssignPermissionSchemeAsync(string projectKeyOrId, IdBean body, string expand = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (projectKeyOrId == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("projectKeyOrId");

            if (body == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("body");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    var json_ = Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert.SerializeObject(body, JsonSerializerSettings);
                    var content_ = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(json_);
                    content_.Headers.ContentType = System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue.Parse("application/json");
                    request_.Content = content_;
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("PUT");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/project/{projectKeyOrId}/permissionscheme"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/project/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(projectKeyOrId, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));
                    urlBuilder_.Append("/permissionscheme");
                    urlBuilder_.Append('?');
                    if (expand != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("expand")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(expand, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    urlBuilder_.Length--;

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<PermissionSchemeBean>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user is not logged in.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user does not have permissions to edit project\'s permission schemes. In practice the user needs to be a Jira administrator.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the project or permission scheme is not found.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Get assigned priority scheme
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Gets a full representation of a priority scheme in JSON format used by specified project. User must be global administrator or project administrator. All project keys associated with the priority scheme will only be returned if additional query parameter is provided expand=projectKeys.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <returns>Returned if the priority scheme exists and the user has permission to view it.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<PrioritySchemeBean> GetAssignedPrioritySchemeAsync(string projectKeyOrId, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (projectKeyOrId == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("projectKeyOrId");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;

            {

                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)

                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;

                        if (status_ == 200)

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Assign project with priority scheme
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Assigns project with priority scheme. Priority scheme assign with migration is possible from the UI. Operation will fail if migration is needed as a result of operation eg. there are issues with priorities invalid in the destination scheme. All project keys associated with the priority scheme will only be returned if additional query parameter is provided expand=projectKeys.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="body">Object that contains an id of the scheme</param>
        /// <returns>Affected priority scheme.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<PrioritySchemeBean> AssignPrioritySchemeAsync(string projectKeyOrId, IdBean body, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (projectKeyOrId == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("projectKeyOrId");

            if (body == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("body");

            var disposeClient_ = false;

            {

                {

                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);

                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/project/");

                    urlBuilder_.Append("/priorityscheme");

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {

                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {

                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);

                            return objectResponse_.Object;

                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the request is not valid and the priority scheme could not be updated. Eg. migration is needed as a result of operation.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)

                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user does not have rights to assign priority schemes.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);

        /// <summary>
        /// Unassign project from priority scheme
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Unassigns project from priority scheme. Operation will fail for defualt priority scheme, project is not found or project is not associated with provided priority scheme. All project keys associated with the priority scheme will only be returned if additional query parameter is provided expand=projectKeys.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <returns>Affected priority scheme.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<PrioritySchemeBean> UnassignPrioritySchemeAsync(long schemeId, string projectKeyOrId, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (schemeId == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("schemeId");

            if (projectKeyOrId == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("projectKeyOrId");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;

            {

                {

                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/project/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(projectKeyOrId, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));
                    urlBuilder_.Append("/priorityscheme/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(schemeId, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;

                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 400)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the request is not valid and the priority scheme could not be updated. Eg. provided scheme is default priority scheme or project is not associated with scheme.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Create project category
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Create a project category.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="body">The project category to create.</param>
        /// <returns>Returned if the project category is created successfully.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<ProjectCategoryJsonBean> CreateProjectCategoryAsync(ProjectCategoryBean body, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (body == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("body");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {

                    var content_ = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(json_);

                    request_.Content = content_;

                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/projectCategory"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/projectCategory");

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 201)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<ProjectCategoryJsonBean>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the caller is not logged in so does not have permission to create project categories.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the caller is authenticated and does not have permission to create project categories (is not global admin).", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 409)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if a project category with the given name already exists.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Get projects matching query
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Returns a list of projects visible to the user where project name and/or key is matching the given query.
        /// <br/>Passing an empty (or whitespace only) query will match no projects. The project matches will
        /// <br/>contain a field with the query highlighted.
        /// <br/>The number of projects returned can be controlled by passing a value for 'maxResults', but a hard limit of no
        /// <br/>more than 100 projects is enforced. The projects are wrapped in a single response object that contains
        /// <br/>a header for use in the picker, specifically 'Showing X of Y matching projects' and the total number
        /// <br/>of matches for the query.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <returns>Returned even when no projects match the given query.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<ProjectPickerResultWrapper> SearchForProjectsAsync(int? maxResults = null, string query = null, bool? allowEmptyQuery = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("GET");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/projects/picker"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/projects/picker");
                    urlBuilder_.Append('?');
                    if (maxResults != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("maxResults")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(maxResults, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (query != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("query")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(query, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (allowEmptyQuery != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("allowEmptyQuery")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(allowEmptyQuery, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    urlBuilder_.Length--;

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<ProjectPickerResultWrapper>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();

            }
            finally

                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Get reindex information
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Returns information on the system reindexes. If a reindex is currently taking place then information about this reindex is returned. If there is no active index task, then returns information about the latest reindex task run, otherwise returns a 404 indicating that no reindex has taken place.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <returns>Returns a representation of the progress of the re-index operation.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<ReindexBean> GetReindexInfoAsync(long? taskId = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("GET");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/reindex"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/reindex");
                    urlBuilder_.Append('?');
                    if (taskId != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("taskId")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(taskId, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    urlBuilder_.Length--;

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<ReindexBean>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if there is no re-indexing task found", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Start a reindex operation
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Kicks off a reindex. Need Admin permissions to perform this reindex.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <returns>Returns a representation of the progress of the re-index operation.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<ReindexBean> ReindexAsync(bool? indexChangeHistory = null, string type = null, bool? indexWorklogs = null, bool? indexComments = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(string.Empty, System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("POST");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/reindex"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/reindex");
                    urlBuilder_.Append('?');
                    if (indexChangeHistory != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("indexChangeHistory")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(indexChangeHistory, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (type != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("type")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(type, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (indexWorklogs != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("indexWorklogs")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(indexWorklogs, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (indexComments != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("indexComments")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(indexComments, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    urlBuilder_.Length--;

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 202)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<ReindexBean>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Reindex individual issues
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Reindexes one or more individual issues. Indexing is performed synchronously - the call returns when indexing of the issues has completed or a failure occurs.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <returns>Returns response indicating reindex time.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<ReindexBean> ReindexIssuesAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string> issueId = null, bool? indexChangeHistory = null, bool? indexWorklogs = null, bool? indexComments = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(string.Empty, System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("POST");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/reindex/issue"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/reindex/issue");
                    urlBuilder_.Append('?');
                    if (issueId != null)
                    {
                        foreach (var item_ in issueId) { urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("issueId")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(item_, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&'); }
                    }
                    if (indexChangeHistory != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("indexChangeHistory")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(indexChangeHistory, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (indexWorklogs != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("indexWorklogs")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(indexWorklogs, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (indexComments != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("indexComments")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(indexComments, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    urlBuilder_.Length--;

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<ReindexBean>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Get reindex progress
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Returns information on the system reindexes. If a reindex is currently taking place then information about this reindex is returned. If there is no active index task, then returns information about the latest reindex task run, otherwise returns a 404 indicating that no reindex has taken place.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <returns>Returns a representation of the progress of the re-index operation.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<ReindexBean> GetReindexProgressAsync(long? taskId = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("GET");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/reindex/progress"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/reindex/progress");
                    urlBuilder_.Append('?');
                    if (taskId != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("taskId")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(taskId, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    urlBuilder_.Length--;

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<ReindexBean>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if there is no re-indexing task found", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Execute pending reindex requests
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Executes any pending reindex requests. Execution is asynchronous - progress of the returned tasks can be monitored through other REST calls.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <returns>Returns an array containing the reindex request IDs being processed.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<long> ProcessRequestsAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(string.Empty, System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("POST");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/reindex/request"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/reindex/request");

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<long>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user is not authorized to process reindex requests.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 500)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if there is an error processing reindex requests.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Get progress of multiple reindex requests
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Retrieves the progress of multiple reindex requests. Only reindex requests that actually exist will be returned in the results.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <returns>An array of results describing the progress of each of the found requests.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<ReindexRequestBean> GetProgressBulkAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<long> requestId = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))

                    }
                    urlBuilder_.Length--;

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
