                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {

                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {

                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)

                    client_.Dispose();

        /// <summary>
        /// Get default system columns for issue navigator
        /// </summary>

        /// Returns the default system columns for issue navigator. Admin permission will be required.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <returns>Returns a list of columns for configured for the given user.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>

                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {

                    client_.Dispose();

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Set default system columns for issue navigator using form
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Sets the default system columns for issue navigator. Admin permission will be required.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <returns>Returned when the columns is saved successfully.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task SetIssueNavigatorDefaultColumnsFormAsync(Body2 body = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    var json_ = Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert.SerializeObject(body, JsonSerializerSettings);
                    var dictionary_ = Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, string>>(json_, JsonSerializerSettings);
                    var content_ = new System.Net.Http.FormUrlEncodedContent(dictionary_);
                    content_.Headers.ContentType = System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue.Parse("application/x-www-form-urlencoded");
                    request_.Content = content_;
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("PUT");

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/settings/columns"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/settings/columns");

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            return;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 500)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if an error occurs while retrieving the column configuration.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Get paginated filtered statuses
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Returns paginated list of filtered statuses
        /// </remarks>
        /// <returns>Returns paginated list of statuses.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<StatusJsonBean> GetPaginatedStatusesAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string> issueTypeIds = null, int? maxResults = null, string query = null, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<long> projectIds = null, long? startAt = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("GET");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/status/page"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/status/page");
                    urlBuilder_.Append('?');
                    if (issueTypeIds != null)
                    {
                        foreach (var item_ in issueTypeIds) { urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("issueTypeIds")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(item_, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&'); }
                    }
                    if (maxResults != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("maxResults")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(maxResults, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (query != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("query")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(query, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (projectIds != null)
                    {
                        foreach (var item_ in projectIds) { urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("projectIds")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(item_, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&'); }
                    }
                    if (startAt != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("startAt")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(startAt, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    urlBuilder_.Length--;

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();

                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)

                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {

                            {

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Get all defined names for 'epic' and 'sprint'
        /// </summary>

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Update epic/sprint names from original to new
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Change epic/sprint names from {originalName} to {newName}. The {newName} will be displayed in Jira instead of {originalName}
        /// <br/>{"originalName"} must be equal to "epic" or "sprint".
        /// <br/>There can be only one entry per unique {"originalName"}.
        /// <br/>{"newName"} can only consist of alphanumeric characters and spaces e.g. {"newName": "iteration number 2"}.
        /// <br/>{"newName"} must be between 1 to 100 characters.
        /// <br/>It can't use the already defined {"newName"} values or restricted JQL words.
        /// <br/>To reset {"newName"} to the default value, enter the {"originalName"} value as the value for {"newName"}. For example, if you want to return to {"originalName": "sprint"}, enter {"newName": "sprint"}.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="body">Collection of TerminologyRequestBean</param>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task SetTerminologyEntriesAsync(TerminologyRequestBean body, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (body == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("body");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    var json_ = Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert.SerializeObject(body, JsonSerializerSettings);
                    var content_ = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(json_);
                    content_.Headers.ContentType = System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue.Parse("application/json");
                    request_.Content = content_;
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("POST");

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/terminology/entries"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/terminology/entries");

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 400)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the provided data isn\'t valid.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user doesn\'t have admin permissions.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the feature is turned off via a feature flag.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else

                        if (status_ == 200 || status_ == 204)
                        {

                            return;
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Get epic or sprint name by original name
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Returns epic or sprint name as specified in the {originalName} path param
        /// </remarks>
        /// <returns>Returns epic or sprint name.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<TerminologyResponseBean> GetTerminologyEntryAsync(string originalName, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (originalName == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("originalName");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("GET");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/terminology/entries/{originalName}"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/terminology/entries/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(originalName, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<TerminologyResponseBean>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if there is no epic or sprint name defined in the {originalName}.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Get all avatars for a type and owner
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Returns a list of all avatars
        /// </remarks>
        /// <returns>Returns a list of all Jira avatars in JSON format, that are visible to the user.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<AvatarBean> GetAvatarsAsync(string type, string owningObjectId, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (type == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("type");

            if (owningObjectId == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("owningObjectId");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("GET");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/universal_avatar/type/{type}/owner/{owningObjectId}"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/universal_avatar/type/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(type, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));
                    urlBuilder_.Append("/owner/");
                    urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(owningObjectId, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<AvatarBean>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {

                            throw new ApiException("Returned if no avatars are found, or the user does not have permission to view them.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);

                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Get result of the last upgrade task
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Returns the result of the last upgrade task.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <returns>Returns the result of the last upgrade.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<UpgradeResultBean> GetUpgradeResultAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("GET");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/upgrade"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/upgrade");

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<UpgradeResultBean>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 303)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the upgrade task is still running.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if no prior upgrade task exists.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Run pending upgrade tasks
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Runs any pending delayed upgrade tasks. Need Admin permissions to do this.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <returns>OK response if successful, array of error messages if schedule fails.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task RunUpgradesNowAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(string.Empty, System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("POST");

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/upgrade"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/upgrade");

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            return;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user does not have admin permissions.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 409)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if ZDU cluster upgrade in progress.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Create new user
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Create user. By default created user will not be notified with email. If password field is not set then password will be randomly generated.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="body">User details</param>
        /// <returns>Returned if the user was created.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<UserWriteBean> CreateUserAsync(UserWriteBean body, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (body == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("body");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    var json_ = Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert.SerializeObject(body, JsonSerializerSettings);
                    var content_ = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(json_);
                    content_.Headers.ContentType = System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue.Parse("application/json");
                    request_.Content = content_;
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("POST");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/user"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/user");

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 201)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<UserWriteBean>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 400)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the request is invalid.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user is not authenticated.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the caller user does not have permission to create the user.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 500)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user was not created because of other error.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Delete user
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Removes user and its references (like project roles associations, watches, history). Note: user references will not be removed if multiple User Directories are used and there is a user with the same name existing in another directory (shadowing user).
        /// </remarks>
        /// <returns>Returned if the user was deleted successfully.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task RemoveUserAsync(string key = null, string username = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("DELETE");

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/user"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/user");
                    urlBuilder_.Append('?');
                    if (key != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("key")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(key, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (username != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("username")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(username, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    urlBuilder_.Length--;

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 204)
                        {
                            return;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 400)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the request is invalid or some other server error occurred.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 401)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the user is not authenticated.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the caller does not have permission to remove the user.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 404)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the caller does have permission to remove user but the user does not exist.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Get available accessibility personal settings
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Returns available accessibility personal settings along with `enabled` property that indicates the currently logged-in user preference.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <returns>Returned when validation succeeded.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<A11yPersonalSettingBean> GetA11yPersonalSettingsAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("GET");
                    request_.Headers.Accept.Add(System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeWithQualityHeaderValue.Parse("application/json"));

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/user/a11y/personal-settings"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/user/a11y/personal-settings");

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            var objectResponse_ = await ReadObjectResponseAsync<A11yPersonalSettingBean>(response_, headers_, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Get validation for user anonymization
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Validates user anonymization process.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <returns>Returned when validation succeeded.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task ValidateUserAnonymizationAsync(string expand = null, string userKey = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("GET");

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/user/anonymization"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/user/anonymization");
                    urlBuilder_.Append('?');
                    if (expand != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("expand")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(expand, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (userKey != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("userKey")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(userKey, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    urlBuilder_.Length--;

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 200)
                        {
                            return;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 400)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if a mandatory parameter was not provided or validation failed.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the logged-in user cannot anonymize users.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>
        /// Schedule user anonymization
        /// </summary>
        /// <remarks>
        /// Schedules a user anonymization process. Requires system admin permission.
        /// </remarks>
        /// <param name="body">JSON containing parameters to schedule the anonymization process with</param>
        /// <returns>Returned if the process was scheduled. Note that it can still fail the extended validation once its execution starts.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task ScheduleUserAnonymizationAsync(UserAnonymizationRequestBean body, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {
            if (body == null)
                throw new System.ArgumentNullException("body");

            var client_ = _httpClient;
            var disposeClient_ = false;
            try
            {
                using (var request_ = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage())
                {
                    var json_ = Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert.SerializeObject(body, JsonSerializerSettings);
                    var content_ = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(json_);
                    content_.Headers.ContentType = System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue.Parse("application/json");
                    request_.Content = content_;
                    request_.Method = new System.Net.Http.HttpMethod("POST");

                    var urlBuilder_ = new System.Text.StringBuilder();
                    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_baseUrl)) urlBuilder_.Append(_baseUrl);
                    // Operation Path: "api/2/user/anonymization"
                    urlBuilder_.Append("api/2/user/anonymization");

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, urlBuilder_);

                    var url_ = urlBuilder_.ToString();
                    request_.RequestUri = new System.Uri(url_, System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute);

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    var response_ = await client_.SendAsync(request_, System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, cancellationToken).ConfigureAwait(false);
                    var disposeResponse_ = true;
                    try
                    {
                        var headers_ = new System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string>>();
                        foreach (var item_ in response_.Headers)
                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)
                        {
                            foreach (var item_ in response_.Content.Headers)
                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        ProcessResponse(client_, response_);

                        var status_ = (int)response_.StatusCode;
                        if (status_ == 202)
                        {
                            return;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 400)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if a mandatory parameter was not provided.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 403)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if the logged-in user cannot anonymize users.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 409)
                        {
                            string responseText_ = ( response_.Content == null ) ? string.Empty : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("Returned if another user anonymization process is already in progress.", status_, responseText_, headers_, null);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var responseData_ = response_.Content == null ? null : await response_.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().ConfigureAwait(false);
                            throw new ApiException("The HTTP status code of the response was not expected (" + status_ + ").", status_, responseData_, headers_, null);
                        }
                    }
                    finally
                    {
                        if (disposeResponse_)
                            response_.Dispose();
                    }
                }
            }
            finally
            {
                if (disposeClient_)
                    client_.Dispose();
            }
        }

        /// <param name="cancellationToken">A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.</param>
        /// <summary>

        /// </summary>

        /// </remarks>
        /// <returns>Returned when validation succeeded.</returns>
        /// <exception cref="ApiException">A server side error occurred.</exception>
        public virtual async System.Threading.Tasks.Task<UserAnonymizationValidationBean> ValidateUserAnonymizationRerunAsync(string expand = null, string oldUserKey = null, string oldUserName = null, string userKey = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(System.Threading.CancellationToken))
        {

            var disposeClient_ = false;

                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("oldUserKey")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(oldUserKey, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }

                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("oldUserName")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(oldUserName, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    if (userKey != null)
                    {
                        urlBuilder_.Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString("userKey")).Append('=').Append(System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ConvertToString(userKey, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture))).Append('&');
                    }
                    urlBuilder_.Length--;

                    PrepareRequest(client_, request_, url_);

                    try

                            headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        if (response_.Content != null && response_.Content.Headers != null)

                                headers_[item_.Key] = item_.Value;
                        }

                        if (status_ == 200)

                            if (objectResponse_.Object == null)
                            {
                                throw new ApiException("Response was null which was not expected.", status_, objectResponse_.Text, headers_, null);
                            }
                            return objectResponse_.Object;
                        }
                        else
                        if (status_ == 400)
                        {
